original: de ni sgo'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni sgo'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of the door.

original: de ni kha'i tshig go /🔽de ni rgyu'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni kha'i tshig go / de ni rgyu'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of the mouth.🔽Those are the words of the cause.

original: de ni rkyen gyi tshig go /🔽de ni mi 'gog pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni rkyen gyi tshig go / de ni mi 'gog pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of the condition.🔽Those are the words of non-cessation.

original: de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of non-contradiction.

original: de ni btang snyoms kyi tshig go /🔽de ni len pa med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni btang snyoms kyi tshig go / de ni len pa med pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of equanimity.🔽Those are the words of non-appropriation.

original: de ni dor ba med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni dor ba med pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of non-rejection.

original: de ni rkyen med pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni rten pa med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni rkyen med pa'i tshig go / de ni rten pa med pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of no conditions.🔽Those are the words of no support.

original: de ni mi gnas pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni ma g-yos pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni mi gnas pa'i tshig go / de ni ma g-yos pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of no abiding.🔽Those are the words of no movement.

original: de ni rnam par ma g-yos @182a *//🔽pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni rnam par ma g-yos @182a *// pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of no movement.

original: de ni sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of no superimposition.

original: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /
analyzed: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of sameness.

original: don ma mnyam pa med pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni bden pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: don ma mnyam pa med pa'i tshig go / de ni bden pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of no inequality.🔽Those are the words of truth.

original: de ni yang dag pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa'i tshig go / de ni mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of reality.🔽Those are the words of immutability.

original: de ni phyir bya ba med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni phyir bya ba med pa'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of no reversal.

original: de ni zhi ba'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni zhi ba'i tshig go /
translated: Those are the words of peace.

original: de ni rab tu zhi ba'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni rab tu zhi ba'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for complete peace.

original: de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for complete tranquility.

original: de ni spros pa med pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni blang ba med pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni gzhag pa med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni spros pa med pa'i tshig go / de ni blang ba med pa'i tshig go / de ni gzhag pa med pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for the absence of conceptual elaboration.🔽That is the word for non-acceptance.🔽That is the word for non-placement.

original: de ni ma tshang ba med pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni lhag pa med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni ma tshang ba med pa'i tshig go / de ni lhag pa med pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for non-deficiency.🔽That is the word for non-excess.🔽That is the word for non-expulsion.

original: de ni phyir dbyung du med pa'i tshig go ;de ni gnyen po med pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni phyir dbyung du med pa'i tshig go ;de ni gnyen po med pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for non-antidote.

original: de ni dam pa'i tshig go /🔽de ni de kho na'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni dam pa'i tshig go / de ni de kho na'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for the sacred.🔽That is the word for reality.

original: de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go /🔽de ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go / de ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go /
translated: That is the word for suchness.🔽That is the word for unerring suchness.

original: de ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go /
analyzed: de ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go /
translated: That is the word for unchanging suchness.

original: de ni ji lta bu bzhin gyi tshig go /
analyzed: de ni ji lta bu bzhin gyi tshig go /
translated: That is the word for the way things are.

original: de ni chud mi za ba'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni chud mi za ba'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for non-wastage.

original: de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig go /🔽de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig go / de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go /
translated: That is the word for the limit of reality.🔽That is the word for the equality of the three times.

original: de ni dus gsum yongs su ma chad pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni dus gsum yongs su ma chad pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the word for the uninterruptedness of the three times.

original: de ni gzugs la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni gzugs la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the phrase for the non-abiding of consciousness in form.

original: de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the phrase for the non-abiding of consciousness in feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: de ni sa'i khams la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni sa'i khams la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the phrase for the non-abiding of consciousness in the earth element.

original: de bzhin du de ni chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par shes pa @182b mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de bzhin du de ni chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par shes pa @182b mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
translated: Similarly, that is the phrase for the non-abiding of consciousness in the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.

original: de ni mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
translated: That is the phrase for the non-abiding of the eye, form, and eye consciousness elements.

original: de bzhin du de ni rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du de ni rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: Similarly, that is the phrase for the non-abiding of the ear, sound, and ear consciousness elements, the nose, smell, and nose consciousness elements, the tongue, taste, and tongue consciousness elements,

original: lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshig go /
translated: It is the words that do not dwell on the body, the tactile, the body-consciousness, the mind, mental objects, or the mind-consciousness.

original: de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go /
translated: It is the words that rely on the meaning.

original: de ni chos la rton pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni chos la rton pa'i tshig go /
translated: It is the words that rely on the Dharma.

original: de ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshig go /
translated: It is the words that rely on wisdom.

original: de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig go /
translated: It is the words that rely on the sūtras of definitive meaning.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang / tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: gzhan yang / tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad do //
translated: “Correct” refers to all phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the self is selfless,

original: chos thams cad rigs pas mthong zhing /
analyzed: chos thams cad rigs pas mthong zhing /
translated: all phenomena are seen through reasoning.

original: ji ltar sems can la bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rigs pas mthong na /
analyzed: ji ltar sems can la bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rigs pas mthong na /
translated: Just as sentient beings are selfless, all phenomena are seen through reasoning.

original: de ltar mthong ba ni tshul bzhin mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba ni tshul bzhin mthong ba'o //
translated: Seeing in this way is seeing correctly.

original: 'khor ba'i khams kyi tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul bzhin yang de yin no zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing bye brag med par mthong ba de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o //🔽gang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang / rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin mtshungs shing bye brag med @183a *//
analyzed: 'khor ba'i khams kyi tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul bzhin yang de yin no zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing bye brag med par mthong ba de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o // gang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang / rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin mtshungs shing bye brag med @183a *//
translated: Whoever sees this as equal, without distinction, is said to be properly engaged.

original: par mthong ba de ni /
analyzed: par mthong ba de ni /
translated: Whoever sees the nature of affliction and the nature of purification as equal, without distinction,

original: tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
translated: is said to be properly engaged.

original: gang rigs pa dang / mi rigs par mi sems pa de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: gang rigs pa dang / mi rigs par mi sems pa de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te /
translated: Whoever does not think in terms of what is reasonable and unreasonable is properly engaged.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mdor na / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas ni sems can no //
analyzed: mdor na / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas ni sems can no //
translated: in brief, all the proper engagements of bodhisattvas are based on sentient beings.

original: de sems can gyi gnas kyang mi spong la /
analyzed: de sems can gyi gnas kyang mi spong la /
translated: They do not abandon the basis of sentient beings,

original: chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrugs par mi byed de /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrugs par mi byed de /
translated: He does not disturb the order of the Dharma.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattva’s application to proper attention.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar de'i chos kyi rnam pa dang / thos pa'i rnam pa dang / tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar de'i chos kyi rnam pa dang / thos pa'i rnam pa dang / tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o //
translated: this is called wisdom, which is the outflow of the bodhisattva’s aspects of the Dharma, his aspects of learning, and his application to proper attention.

original: de la shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug dang lhan cig mi gnas te /
analyzed: de la shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug dang lhan cig mi gnas te /
translated: “Wisdom does not dwell together with the sixteen companions.

original: bcu drug po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu drug po dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the sixteen?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: mi rig pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: mi rig pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: Wisdom does not dwell together with the companion of ignorance.

original: de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: In the same way, it does not dwell together with the companions of volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death.

original: ma rig pa 'gog pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gog pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: It does not abide together with the cessation of ignorance.

original: de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len @183b pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang /🔽rga shi 'gog pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len @183b pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi 'gog pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: Similarly, it does not abide together with the cessation of volitional formations, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense spheres, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth,🔽and old age and death.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: It does not abide together with the companionship of the view of the transitory collection,

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung bar lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po'i bar dag gis 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung bar lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po'i bar dag gis 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: up to it does not abide together with the companionship of the sixty-two views that arise from the root of the view of the transitory collection.

original: mtho dman gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: mtho dman gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: It does not abide together with the companionship of high and low,🔽up to

original: 'jig rten gyi chos rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / sman pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / sman pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: He does not dwell together with the worldly dharmas, from acquisition and non-acquisition up to fame and lack of fame, blame and praise, happiness and suffering.

original: khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / yongs su gdung ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang / khengs pa dang /
analyzed: khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / yongs su gdung ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang / khengs pa dang /
translated: He does not dwell together with anger, resentment, hypocrisy, envy, stinginess, deceit, fraud, shamelessness, lack of conscience, conceit,

original: rtsod pa dang / rgyags pa dang / bag med pa dang / nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /
analyzed: rtsod pa dang / rgyags pa dang / bag med pa dang / nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /
translated: quarreling, intoxication, heedlessness, pride, excessive pride, pride over pride, the conceit “me,” the conceit of thinking “I am,” the conceit of thinking “I am better,”🔽and the conceit of thinking “I am worse.”

original: log pa'i nga rgyal rnams kyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: log pa'i nga rgyal rnams kyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with any of these.

original: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so; ;'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba phra mo dang / sbom po dang / chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so; ;'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba phra mo dang / sbom po dang / chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with the company of all the secondary afflictions. He does not dwell together with the company of the subtle, gross, small, medium, and great upsurges of desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: @184a *// nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba'i thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: @184a *// nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba'i thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: He does not dwell together with the company of all the upsurges of afflictions.

original: gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog dang / sgrib pa dang / chong pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog dang / sgrib pa dang / chong pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with the company of the darkness of ignorance, the cataracts of blindness, the obscurations, and the bonds.

original: nyams par 'gyur ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so; ;'dod pa dang / 'thab mo'i rnyog pa dang / phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang /
analyzed: nyams par 'gyur ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so; ;'dod pa dang / 'thab mo'i rnyog pa dang / phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang /
translated: He does not dwell together with the company of all the upsurges of phenomena that are conducive to decline. He does not dwell together with the company of desire, the defilements of quarrels, the aggregates, the afflictions, the Lord of Death,

original: lha'i bu'i bdud rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: lha'i bu'i bdud rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with the Māra of the sons of the gods,

original: bdud kyi las thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: bdud kyi las thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: nor with any of the works of Māra.🔽He does not dwell together with the clinging to self,

original: bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bur 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bur 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: to a sentient being, to a living being, to a person, to an individual, to a human being, to a human,

original: 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: nor with any clinging to the notion of an individual.🔽He does not dwell together with the obscurations of karma,

original: las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa dang / 'gro ba'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes pa'i sgrib pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa dang / 'gro ba'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes pa'i sgrib pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: the obscurations of the mental afflictions, the obscurations of views, the obscurations of the destinies, the obscurations of ripening, the obscurations of knowledge,

original: bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: nor with any latent tendencies or connections.

original: rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / @184b bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par rig pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / @184b bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par rig pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with thoughts, discursive thoughts, or conceptual thoughts, with signs or reference points, with seeing, hearing, discerning, or cognizing,

original: mdud pa dang / sgro btags pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: mdud pa dang / sgro btags pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: or with any knots or labels.

original: bdag dang / rtag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bde ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: bdag dang / rtag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bde ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with the notions of self, permanence, purity, or happiness,

original: phyin ci log thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //🔽sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: phyin ci log thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so // sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: or with any of the errors.🔽He does not dwell together with the eighty-four thousand types of mental activity of sentient beings,

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: or with the eighty-four thousand bundles of Dharma.

original: ser sna dang / gtong ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang; gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: ser sna dang / gtong ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang; gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with stinginess, generosity, immorality, moral discipline, malice, patience, laziness, effort, distraction, meditative concentration, or confused intelligence.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs sems pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs sems pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: He does not dwell together with the mental states that are adverse to the perfections.

original: nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa dang / log pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang; kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa dang / log pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang; kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
translated: He does not dwell together with the determined, the undetermined, the correct, the incorrect, the virtuous, the nonvirtuous, that which is reprehensible, that which is irreproachable, that which is defiled, or that which is undefiled.

original: zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with the conditioned or the unconditioned, the mundane or the supramundane, the good or the bad, the defiled or the purified, saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: @185a *// chos thams cad kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //🔽theg pa tha dad pa dang / sems can tha dad pa dang / zhing tha dad pa dang / sangs rgyas tha dad pa dang / chos tha dad pa dang / dge 'dun tha dad pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: @185a *// chos thams cad kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so // theg pa tha dad pa dang / sems can tha dad pa dang / zhing tha dad pa dang / sangs rgyas tha dad pa dang / chos tha dad pa dang / dge 'dun tha dad pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with any phenomena, from the unfavorable to the antidotes.

original: tha dad pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: tha dad pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: He does not dwell together with different vehicles, different sentient beings, different realms, different buddhas, different Dharma, or different saṅghas. He does not dwell together with any differences at all.

original: mi shes pa dang / shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
analyzed: mi shes pa dang / shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas /
translated: He does not dwell together with ignorance, knowledge, consciousness, the conventional, or the ultimate.

original: mtshan ma yid la byed pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
analyzed: mtshan ma yid la byed pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
translated: It does not coexist with any mental activity involving signs.

original: shes rab ni gang rgyu ba med pa /
analyzed: shes rab ni gang rgyu ba med pa /
translated: Wisdom is without movement,

original: lus med pa /
analyzed: lus med pa /
translated: without body,

original: mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: without characteristics,

original: mtshan ma med pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa /
translated: without signs,

original: 'dus ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa ste /
translated: and unconditioned.

original: de ni mtshan ma dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gnas dang / ming dang / mtshan ma dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang lhan cig mi gnas te /
analyzed: de ni mtshan ma dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gnas dang / ming dang / mtshan ma dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang lhan cig mi gnas te /
translated: It does not coexist with any signs, mental activity, mind, thought, consciousness, abode, name, or sign, whether singular or plural.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug po de dag dang lhan cig mi gnas so ////
analyzed: shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug po de dag dang lhan cig mi gnas so ////
translated: wisdom does not coexist with these sixteen companions.

original: bam po bzhi pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi pa /
translated: PART FOUR

original: de la shes rab kyi yul gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi yul gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the domain of wisdom?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chos brgyad la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: chos brgyad la mkhas pa'o //
translated: It is skill in the eight dharmas.

original: de la chos brgyad la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos brgyad la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is skill in the eight dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / rten cing @185b 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / dus gsum la mkhas pa dang / theg pa thams cad la mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / rten cing @185b 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / dus gsum la mkhas pa dang / theg pa thams cad la mkhas pa dang /
translated: It is skill in the aggregates, skill in the elements, skill in the sense fields, skill in the truths, skill in dependent origination, skill in the three times, skill in all vehicles,

original: chos thams cad la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mkhas pa'o //
translated: and skill in all phenomena.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bodhisattvas’ skill in the aggregates?

original: gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya bar bstan pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya bar bstan pa ste /
translated: It is the teaching that the aggregates are like a mass of foam,

original: dbu ba rdos par bstan pa dang / chu'i chu bur du bstan pa dang / smig rgyur bstan pa dang / chu shing gi sdong por bstan pa dang / sgyu mar bstan pa dang / rmi lam du bstan pa dang / brag car bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dbu ba rdos par bstan pa dang / chu'i chu bur du bstan pa dang / smig rgyur bstan pa dang / chu shing gi sdong por bstan pa dang / sgyu mar bstan pa dang / rmi lam du bstan pa dang / brag car bstan pa dang /
translated: like a bubble of water, like a mirage, like a plantain tree, like an illusion, like a dream, like an echo,

original: mig yor du bstan pa dang / gzugs brnyan du bstan pa dang / sprul par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mig yor du bstan pa dang / gzugs brnyan du bstan pa dang / sprul par bstan pa'o //
translated: like an apparition, like a reflection, and like a magical creation.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs ni dbu brdos pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: gzugs ni dbu brdos pa lta bu ste /
translated: Form is like a lump of foam.

original: dbu brdos pa lta bu ni bdag ma yin /
analyzed: dbu brdos pa lta bu ni bdag ma yin /
translated: A lump of foam is not a self,

original: sems can ma yin /🔽srog ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin / srog ma yin /
translated: not a sentient being,🔽not a life-force,

original: gso ba ma yin /
analyzed: gso ba ma yin /
translated: not a creature,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not a human,🔽not a person.

original: gang zag ma yin no; ;dbu brdos pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no; ;dbu brdos pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
translated: The nature of a lump of foam is the nature of form.

original: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: One who is skilled in this is said to be skilled in the aggregates.

original: tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
translated: Feelings are like bubbles on water.

original: 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o //
translated: Perceptions are like mirages.

original: 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu'o //
translated: Formations are like plantain trees.

original: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: Consciousness is like an illusion.

original: sgyu ma'ang bdag ma yin /
analyzed: sgyu ma'ang bdag ma yin /
translated: An illusion is not a self,

original: sems can ma yin /🔽srog ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin / srog ma yin /
translated: not a sentient being,🔽not a life-force,

original: gso ba ma yin /
analyzed: gso ba ma yin /
translated: not a creature,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not a human,

original: gang zag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no //
translated: not a person.

original: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te /
translated: The nature of an illusion is the nature of consciousness.

original: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas @186a *//
analyzed: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas @186a *//
translated: Those who are skilled in this are skilled in the aggregates of the bodhisattvas.🔽

original: pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pa zhes bya'o //
translated: One who is skilled in this is called a bodhisattva skilled in the aggregates.

original: phung po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
translated: The aggregates are like a dream.

original: rmi lam yang bdag ma yin /
analyzed: rmi lam yang bdag ma yin /
translated: A dream is not a self,

original: sems can ma yin /🔽srog ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin / srog ma yin /
translated: not a sentient being,🔽not a life-force,

original: gso ba ma yin /
analyzed: gso ba ma yin /
translated: not a creature,🔽not a person,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not a human,

original: gang zag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no //
translated: and not a human being.

original: rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /🔽gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te / gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
translated: The nature of a dream is also the nature of the aggregates.🔽One who is skilled in this is called a bodhisattva skilled in the aggregates.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o; ;phung po rnams ni brag ca lta bu ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o; ;phung po rnams ni brag ca lta bu ste /
translated: The aggregates are like an echo.

original: brag ca ni bdag ma yin /
analyzed: brag ca ni bdag ma yin /
translated: An echo is not a self,

original: sems can ma yin /🔽srog ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin / srog ma yin /
translated: not a sentient being,🔽not a life-force,

original: gso ba ma yin /
analyzed: gso ba ma yin /
translated: not a creature,🔽not a person,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not a human,

original: gang zag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no //
translated: and not a human being.

original: brag ca'i rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
analyzed: brag ca'i rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
translated: The nature of an echo is also the nature of the aggregates.

original: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
analyzed: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
translated: One who is skilled in this is called a bodhisattva skilled in the aggregates.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattva’s expertise with regard to the aggregates.

original: phung po rnams ni mig yor lta bu ste /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni mig yor lta bu ste /
translated: “The aggregates are like optical illusions.

original: mig yor kyang bdag ma yin /
analyzed: mig yor kyang bdag ma yin /
translated: Optical illusions are not the self,

original: sems can ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin /
translated: not sentient beings,🔽not living creatures,

original: srog ma yin /🔽gso ba ma yin /
analyzed: srog ma yin / gso ba ma yin /
translated: not lives,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not humans,

original: gang zag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no //
translated: and not persons.

original: mig yor gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
analyzed: mig yor gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
translated: The nature of optical illusions is the nature of the aggregates.

original: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
analyzed: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
translated: Those who are skilled in this

original: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are called ‘bodhisattvas skilled in the aggregates.’

original: phung po rnams ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste; gzugs brnyan ni bdag ma yin /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste; gzugs brnyan ni bdag ma yin /
translated: “The aggregates are like reflections. Reflections are not the self,

original: sems can ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin /
translated: not sentient beings,🔽not living creatures,

original: srog ma yin /🔽gsob ma yin /
analyzed: srog ma yin / gsob ma yin /
translated: not lives,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not humans,

original: gang zag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no //
translated: and not persons.

original: gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa @186b phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa @186b phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
translated: The nature of reflections is the nature of the aggregates.

original: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
analyzed: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni /
translated: Those who are skilled in this

original: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are called ‘bodhisattvas skilled in the aggregates.’

original: phung po rnams ni sprul pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni sprul pa lta bu ste /
translated: The aggregates are like magical creations.

original: sprul pa ni bdag ma yin /
analyzed: sprul pa ni bdag ma yin /
translated: A magical creation is not a self,

original: sems can ma yin /
analyzed: sems can ma yin /
translated: not a sentient being,

original: srog ma yin /🔽gso ba ma yin /
analyzed: srog ma yin / gso ba ma yin /
translated: not a life-force,🔽not a person,

original: skyes bu ma yin /
analyzed: skyes bu ma yin /
translated: not a human,

original: gang zag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag ma yin no //
translated: and not an individual.

original: sprul pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
analyzed: sprul pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te /
translated: The nature of a magical creation is also the nature of the aggregates.

original: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: One who is skilled in this is called a bodhisattva skilled in the aggregates.

original: phung po zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten te /
analyzed: phung po zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten te /
translated: The so-called aggregates are the world.

original: 'jig rten kyang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten kyang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The world has the characteristic of destruction.

original: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa'o //
translated: The nature of the world is by nature impermanent.

original: rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal pa'o //
translated: It is by nature suffering.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
translated: It is by nature empty.

original: rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'o //
translated: It is by nature selfless.

original: rang bzhin gyis zhi ba ste; gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis zhi ba ste; gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is by nature peaceful. One who is skilled in this is called a bodhisattva skilled in the aggregates.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattvas’ expertise concerning the elements?

original: gang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It is the wisdom that penetrates the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni sa'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni sa'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the earth element,

original: chos kyi dbyings sra ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sra ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by solidity.

original: chos kyi dbyings chu'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings chu'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the water element,

original: chos kyi dbyings rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by wetness.

original: chos kyi dbyings me'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings me'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the fire element,

original: chos kyi dbyings yongs su smin par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yongs su smin par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by the ripening of things.

original: chos kyi dbyings rlung gi khams yin mod @187a *//
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rlung gi khams yin mod @187a *//
translated: The realm of phenomena is the wind element,

original: kyi; chos kyi dbyings g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: kyi; chos kyi dbyings g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by movement.

original: chos kyi dbyings mig gi khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mig gi khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the eye element,

original: chos kyi dbyings lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by seeing.

original: chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the ear element,

original: chos kyi dbyings nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not characterized by hearing.

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sna'i khams yin mod kyi /

original: chos kyi dbyings snom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings snom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by smelling.

original: chos kyi dbyings lce'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings lce'i khams yin mod kyi /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings myong bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by experiencing.

original: chos kyi dbyings lus kyi khams yin mod kyi /

original: chos kyi dbyings nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the realm of phenomena is not characterized by touching.

original: chos kyi dbyings yid kyi khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yid kyi khams yin mod kyi /

original: chos kyi dbyings rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

original: chos kyi dbyings mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /

original: chos kyi dbyings gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

original: chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the element of ear consciousness,

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sgra so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dri so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

original: chos kyi dbyings lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ro so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

analyzed: @187b chos kyi dbyings lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings reg bya so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi /

original: chos kyi dbyings chos so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings chos so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

original: chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharmadhātu is the element of form,🔽but the dharmadhātu is not the characteristic of form.

original: chos kyi dbyings mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

original: chos kyi dbyings sgra'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sgra'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is indeed the sound element,

original: chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //

original: chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is indeed the smell element,

original: chos kyi dbyings sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharma-dhātu is not the characteristic that is cognized by the nose consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is indeed the taste element,

original: chos kyi dbyings lce'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings lce'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharma-dhātu is not the characteristic that is cognized by the tongue consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is indeed the touch element,

original: chos kyi dbyings lus kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings lus kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharma-dhātu is not the characteristic that is cognized by the body consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings chos kyi khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings chos kyi khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is indeed the phenomena element,🔽but the dharma-dhātu is not the characteristic that is cognized by the mind consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The dharmadhātu is not characterized by being cognized by the mental consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharmadhātu is indeed the form element,

original: chos kyi dbyings gzugs su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings gzugs su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharmadhātu is not characterized by cognizing form.

original: chos kyi dbyings sgra'i khams @188a *//🔽yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sgra'i khams @188a *// yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharmadhātu is indeed the sound element,

original: chos kyi dbyings sgrar rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sgrar rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharmadhātu is not characterized by cognizing sound.

original: chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharmadhātu is indeed the smell element,

original: chos kyi dbyings drir rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings drir rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharmadhātu is not characterized by cognizing smell.

original: chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharmadhātu is indeed the taste element,

original: chos kyi dbyings ror rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ror rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharmadhātu is not characterized by cognizing taste.

original: chos kyi dbyings reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The dharmadhātu is indeed the touch element,

original: chos kyi dbyings reg byar rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings reg byar rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the dharmadhātu is not characterized by cognizing touch.

original: chos kyi dbyings chos kyi khams yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings chos kyi khams yin mod kyi /
translated: The realm of phenomena is indeed the element of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings chos su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings chos su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But the realm of phenomena is not characterized by the awareness of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so //
translated: The realm of phenomena and the element of self are the same.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams de ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams de ni mtshungs so //
translated: The realm of phenomena and the elements of desire, form, and formlessness are the same.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / 'khor ba'i khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / 'khor ba'i khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de ni mtshungs so //
translated: The realm of phenomena and the element of saṃsāra and the element of nirvāṇa are the same.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos thams cad kyi khams de ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos thams cad kyi khams de ni mtshungs so //
translated: The realm of phenomena and the element of sentient beings, the element of space, and the element of all phenomena are the same.

original: de ci'i phyir de mtshungs zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir de mtshungs zhe na /
translated: Why are they the same?

original: stong pa nyid du mtshungs pas na de ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du mtshungs pas na de ni mtshungs so //
translated: They are the same because they are the same in emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med par mtshungs pa dang / smon pa med par mtshungs pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed par mtshungs pa dang / skye ba med par mtshungs pa dang / 'byung ba med par mtshungs pa dang / dngos po med @188b par mtshungs pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med par mtshungs pa dang / smon pa med par mtshungs pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed par mtshungs pa dang / skye ba med par mtshungs pa dang / 'byung ba med par mtshungs pa dang / dngos po med @188b par mtshungs pa dang /
translated: They are the same in being signless, the same in being wishless, the same in being without performance, the same in being unborn, the same in being unarisen, the same in being insubstantial,

original: chos thams cad tha dad pa med par mtshungs pa dang / sgrib pa med par mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams su mtshungs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mtshungs pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad tha dad pa med par mtshungs pa dang / sgrib pa med par mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams su mtshungs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mtshungs pas /
translated: the same in being without distinction among all phenomena, the same in being without obscuration, the same in being the realm of space, and the same in being the realm of nirvāṇa.

original: de dag mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag mtshungs pa'o //
translated: They are the same in all these ways.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'jug pa tshad med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'jug pa tshad med de /
translated: “The engagement with the realm of conditioned phenomena and the engagement with the realm of unconditioned phenomena are immeasurable.

original: gang bstan pa de la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi sgo nas 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang bstan pa de la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi sgo nas 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The engagement with the realm of phenomena through the gateway of the principle of the realm of phenomena is called the bodhisatvas’ skill in the elements.”

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bodhisattva’s expertise concerning the sense-spheres?

original: chos kyi skye mched la 'jug pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched la 'jug pa'i ye shes te /
translated: It is the knowledge that penetrates the sense-sphere of phenomena.

original: chos kyi skye mched ni mig gi skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ni mig gi skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-sphere of phenomena is indeed the sense-sphere of the eye,

original: chos kyi skye mched lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the sense-sphere of phenomena is not characterized by seeing.

original: chos kyi skye mched rna ba'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched rna ba'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-sphere of phenomena is indeed the sense-sphere of the ear,

original: chos kyi skye mched nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the sense-sphere of phenomena is not characterized by hearing.

original: chos kyi skye mched sna'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched sna'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-sphere of phenomena is indeed the sense-sphere of the nose,

original: chos kyi skye mched snom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched snom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the sense-sphere of phenomena is not characterized by smelling.

original: chos kyi skye mched lce'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched lce'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-sphere of phenomena is indeed the sense-sphere of the tongue,

original: chos kyi skye mched myang ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched myang ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the sense-sphere of phenomena is not characterized by tasting.

original: chos kyi skye mched lus kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched lus kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-sphere of phenomena is indeed the sense-sphere of the body,

original: chos kyi skye mched nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the sense-sphere of phenomena is not characterized by touching.

original: chos kyi skye mched yid kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched yid kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The element of mental objects is the element of the mental faculty.

original: chos kyi skye mched chos rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched chos rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But the element of mental objects is not the characteristic of the knowledge of mental objects.

original: chos kyi skye mched gzugs kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /🔽chos kyi skye mched mig gi rnam par @189a *//
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched gzugs kyi skye mched yin mod kyi / chos kyi skye mched mig gi rnam par @189a *//
translated: The element of mental objects is the element of form.

original: shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But the element of mental objects is not the characteristic of the object of visual consciousness.

original: chos kyi skye mched sgra'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched sgra'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The element of mental objects is the element of sound.

original: chos kyi skye mched rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But the element of mental objects is not the characteristic of the object of auditory consciousness.

original: chos kyi skye mched dri'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched dri'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The element of mental objects is the element of smell.

original: chos kyi skye mched sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But the element of mental objects is not the characteristic of the object of olfactory consciousness.

original: chos kyi skye mched ro'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ro'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The element of mental objects is the element of taste.

original: chos kyi skye mched lce'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched lce'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The sense-field of mental objects is not the characteristic that is cognized by the consciousness of the tongue.

original: chos kyi skye mched reg bya'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched reg bya'i skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-field of mental objects is indeed the sense-field of the tangible,

original: chos kyi skye mched lus kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched lus kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but the sense-field of mental objects is not the characteristic that is cognized by the consciousness of the body.

original: chos kyi skye mched chos kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched chos kyi skye mched yin mod kyi /
translated: The sense-field of mental objects is indeed the sense-field of mental objects,

original: chos kyi skye mched yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: but the sense-field of mental objects is not the characteristic that is cognized by the consciousness of the mind.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattva’s expertise in the sense-fields.

original: gzhan yang / skye mched la mkhas pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang / skye mched la mkhas pa ni /
translated: “Moreover, expertise in the sense-fields🔽is as follows:

original: mig gi skye mched ni /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched ni /
translated: The sense-field of the eye

original: bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: is empty of a self and what belongs to a self.

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang /
translated: Likewise, the ear sense-sphere, the nose sense-sphere, the tongue sense-sphere, the body sense-sphere, the mental sense-sphere, the form sense-sphere, the sound sense-sphere, the smell sense-sphere, the taste sense-sphere,

original: reg bya'i skye mched dang / @189b chos kyi skye mched dag kyang bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: reg bya'i skye mched dang / @189b chos kyi skye mched dag kyang bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: the tangible sense-sphere, and the dharma sense-sphere are empty of a self and what belongs to a self.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis /🔽ji skad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis / ji skad du /
translated: The Bhagavān has said:

original: mig ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste /
analyzed: mig ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste /
translated: “The eye is empty of a self and what belongs to a self.

original: 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This is its nature.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste /
translated: Likewise, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are empty of a self and what belongs to a self.

original: 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This is their nature.

original: de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste /
translated: Likewise, forms, sounds, smells, tastes, tangibles, and dharmas are empty of a self and what belongs to a self.

original: 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is its nature.

original: 'di ltar gang skye mched rnams la skye mched du mi byed cing /🔽dge ba'i chos kyang mi gsog /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang skye mched rnams la skye mched du mi byed cing / dge ba'i chos kyang mi gsog /
translated: Thus, it is skill in the sense bases if one does not take the sense bases to be sense bases,🔽does not accumulate virtuous qualities,

original: mi dge ba'i chos kyang 'bri bar mi byed la /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos kyang 'bri bar mi byed la /
translated: does not diminish non-virtuous qualities,

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
translated: and does not have dualistic notions about virtue and non-virtue.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ skill in the sense bases.

original: gzhan yang / skye mched la mkhas pa ni; mig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang / rten na gzugs kyi skye mched de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / skye mched la mkhas pa ni; mig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang / rten na gzugs kyi skye mched de /
translated: Moreover, skill in the sense bases is as follows: The sense base of form is the basis and support for attachment to the sense base of the eye.

original: gang mig gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gang mig gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: If one sees the sense base of form as free from attachment to the eye, but does not actualize the Dharma of freedom from attachment,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called the bodhisattvas’ skill in the sense bases.

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched kyi sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched kyi dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched kyi ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched kyi rig bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched kyi sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched kyi dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched kyi ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched kyi rig bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang /
translated: Similarly, the ear sense source is the sound sense source, the nose sense source is the smell sense source, the tongue sense source is the taste sense source, the body sense source is the tangible sense source, and the mind sense source is the attachment sense source.

original: rten ni chos kyi skye mched de /🔽gang yid chos las 'dod @190a *//
analyzed: rten ni chos kyi skye mched de / gang yid chos las 'dod @190a *//
translated: The support is the phenomena sense source.

original: chags dang bral bar mthong la /
analyzed: chags dang bral bar mthong la /
translated: When one sees the mind as free from attachment to phenomena,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: but does not actualize the phenomena of freedom from attachment,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o; ;skye mched ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o; ;skye mched ces bya ba ni /
translated: this is called the bodhisattvas’ expertise in the sense sources.🔽The sense sources are

original: 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched do //
translated: the noble sense sources and the non-noble sense sources.

original: de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni /
translated: The noble sense sources

original: gang lam yang dag par bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: gang lam yang dag par bsgrub pa'o //
translated: are the correct practice of the path.

original: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni /
translated: The non-noble sense sources

original: gang lam dang mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: gang lam dang mi mthun pa'o //
translated: are contrary to the path.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas lam dang mi mthun pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed cing /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas lam dang mi mthun pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed cing /
translated: “Here, bodhisattvas, abiding in the path, generate great compassion for beings who engage in conduct that is contrary to the path.

original: lam gyi skye mched kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni /
analyzed: lam gyi skye mched kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni /
translated: They do not abandon the path,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and this is called the bodhisattvas’ expertise in the sense sources.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattvas’ expertise in the truths?

original: 'jug pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: 'jug pa bzhi ni /
translated: The four kinds of engagement

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin te /
translated: are the bodhisattvas’ expertise in the truths.

original: 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four kinds of engagement?

original: gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa'o //
translated: They are the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of the origin of suffering, the knowledge of the cessation of suffering, and the knowledge of the path.

original: de la sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The knowledge of suffering

original: gang phung po rnams ni mi skye bar shes pa'o //🔽kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya ba ni /🔽gang sred pa legs par 'joms pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang phung po rnams ni mi skye bar shes pa'o // kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya ba ni / gang sred pa legs par 'joms pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: is the knowledge that the aggregates do not arise.🔽The knowledge of the origin of suffering🔽is the knowledge that destroys craving.

original: 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The knowledge of the cessation of suffering

original: ma rig pa dang / bag la nyal ba rnams mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / bag la nyal ba rnams mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: and the absence of ignorance and latent tendencies.

original: lam shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lam shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Knowledge of the path” means

original: mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i chos thams @190b cad la sgro mi 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i chos thams @190b cad la sgro mi 'dogs pa ste /
translated: not exaggerating any phenomena that have become sameness.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa shes pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ knowledge of the truths.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la de lta bus shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rab tu shes kyang sems can la blta ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la de lta bus shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rab tu shes kyang sems can la blta ba'i phyir /
translated: “In this way, the bodhisattvas know the four noble truths with such wisdom and knowledge, but in order to look after sentient beings,

original: mngon sum du mi byed cing /
analyzed: mngon sum du mi byed cing /
translated: they do not actualize them.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de /
translated: They bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattvas’ expertise concerning the truths.

original: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: “Moreover, there are three kinds of truths for the bodhisattvas.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: gang 'di kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang; mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang; mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o //
translated: They are the truth of the conventional, the truth of the ultimate, and the truth of characteristics.

original: de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is relative truth?

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdas bstan pa ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdas bstan pa ji snyed pa'o //
translated: It is the conventional expressions, letters, words, and symbols of the world.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
translated: What is ultimate truth?

original: gang la sems kyi rgyu med pa ste /🔽yi ge lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang la sems kyi rgyu med pa ste / yi ge lta ci smos /
translated: It is that which the mind cannot reach,🔽let alone letters.

original: mtshan nyid kyi bden pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi bden pa ni /
translated: What is the truth of characteristics?

original: gang 'di mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'di mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: It is that all characteristics are one characteristic,🔽and that one characteristic is no characteristic.

original: mtshan nyid gcig po'ang mtshan nyid med pa'o; ;de la byang chub sems dpa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig po'ang mtshan nyid med pa'o; ;de la byang chub sems dpa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo /
translated: The bodhisattva, through teaching relative truth, does not become weary;

original: don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du byed pa'ang mi ltung /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du byed pa'ang mi ltung /
translated: through realizing ultimate truth, he does not fall into the extreme of nirvāṇa;

original: mtshan nyid kyi bden pas bden pa gcig tu rtogs kyang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi bden pas bden pa gcig tu rtogs kyang /
translated: and through the truth of characteristics, he realizes the one truth.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de /
translated: He also brings sentient beings to full maturity.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattva’s expertise in the truths.

original: gzhan yang / bden pa rnam pa @191a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang / bden pa rnam pa @191a *//
translated: What are the four noble truths?

original: gnyis te / rnam pa gnyis po gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis te / rnam pa gnyis po gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: gang 'di tha snyad kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di tha snyad kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: They are conventional truth and ultimate truth.

original: de la tha snyad kyi bden pa ni /
analyzed: de la tha snyad kyi bden pa ni /
translated: Among them, conventional truth

original: dus su bden par smra ba ste /
analyzed: dus su bden par smra ba ste /
translated: is the truth of the times.

original: gang 'di sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bden pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdas bstan pa ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bden pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdas bstan pa ji snyed pa'o //
translated: It is the truth of suffering, the truth of the origin of suffering, the truth of the cessation of suffering, the truth of the path, the conventional truth of the world, and as much as is taught by letters, sounds, and symbols.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa gang /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa gang /
translated: What is ultimate truth?

original: 'di brjod pa med pa'i chos can /
analyzed: 'di brjod pa med pa'i chos can /
translated: It is the inexpressible subject.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: It is nirvāṇa.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rtag tu chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rtag tu chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is always the suchness of phenomena.

original: de'i rigs ni rtag pa'i phyir ro //
